text: Timothy Collins "Tim" Wilson (August 5, 1961 â€“ February 26, 2014) was an American stand-up comedian and country musician. He released many comedy albums. He worked with Capitol Records in Nashville. He made many appearances on the John Boy and Billy, Big D and Bubba and Bob and Tom Show. Wilson died from a heart attack. He was aged 52.Stallings, Amy (February 27, 2014).Report: Comedian Tim Wilson dies after suffering heart attack whas11.com.
